info.description: This is the REST API to the PANDA database. \n This is the only place to access data from the PANDA database.
info.title: PANDA REST API - localhost

parameters.description: Item UID to exclude from check (for updates)
parameters.name: excludeUid

get.summary: Get catalogue service type by uid

delete.description: Delete an order by order UID

get.description: CSV header: Media Type,Code,Experimental System,User Call,User Experiment,DOI,Web Link,Open Access Type,Title,Authors,Authors Count,ELI Authors,ELI Authors Count,Journal Title,Volume,Issue,Pages,Pages Count,Cite As,Impact Factor,Quartile Basis,Quartile,Year Of Publication,Date Of Publication,Abstract,Keywords,OECD Ford,Grant,WOS Number,ISSN,E-ISSN,EID Scopus,Publishing Country,Language,Note,UID

Get room card layout information for external systems to display scientific complex layout

Status values:
- DIRTY_MODE: Room is dirty and needs cleaning
- CLEAN_MODE: Room is clean and ready for use
- IN_PREPARATION_MODE: Room is being prepared for use

PurityClass values (ISO standards):
- ISO_5: ISO Class 5 cleanroom
- ISO_6: ISO Class 6 cleanroom
- ISO_7: ISO Class 7 cleanroom
- ISO_8: ISO Class 8 cleanroom

StatusColor values (automatically assigned based on status):
- DIRTY_MODE: #fecaca (light red)
- CLEAN_MODE: #d9f99d (light green)
- IN_PREPARATION_MODE: #fdba74 (light orange)
- Unknown status: #808080 (gray)

OperationalState: Codebook containing uid, name, and code of the operational state

OperationalStateColor values (automatically assigned based on operationalState.code):
- OS1: #22c55e (green)
- OS2: #86efac (light green)
- OS3: #facc15 (yellow)
- OS4: #fb923c (orange)
- OS5: #ef4444 (red)
- OS6: #b91c1c (dark red)
- Unknown/null: #9ca3af (gray)
get.summary: Get room card layout info by location code

post.description: Creates a new system with the given details

201.description: Returns the UID of the created system

post.description: Creates a new system using data from a Jira import request

201.description: Returns the UID of the created system

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or system code already exists

post.description: Create new system with new unique system code based on system type and zone
Assigns a spare item to a system, updating the item's condition and system association

200.description: Returns the updated spare item information

400.description: Bad request - missing required fields or invalid data

get.description: Get comprehensive system and physical item information with all spare relations by system ID

200.description: Returns comprehensive system spare parts information

post.description: Move systems to another parent system
Recalculate spare parts for all systems

get.description: Returns a simplified paginated list of systems where `systemCode` is filled; supports optional filtering by zone, system type, and search text.

parameters.description: Column filter JSON (may contain ids: zone, systemType, searchText; also accepts search)
parameters.name: columnFilter

post.description: Creates a batch of new systems with generated system codes for the given system type and zone. System name is set to the generated system code.
post.summary: Create new systems with generated system codes

get.description: Generates a preview of the next N system codes for a given system type and zone without creating any systems.

authorsCount.description: authorsCount is the authors count of the publication

department.description: department is the department of the publication

abstract.description: abstract is the abstract of the publication

allAuthors.description: allAuthors is the all authors of the publication

allAuthorsCount.description: allAuthorsCount is the all authors count of the publication

authorsDepartments.description: authorsDepartments is the authors departments of the publication

authorsDepartmentsArray.description: authorsDepartmentsArray is the authors departments array of the publication

citeAs.description: citeAs is the citation of the publication

code.description: code is the internal code of the publication

dateOfPublication.description: dateOfPublication is the date of publication of the publication

doi.description: doi is the unique identifier of the publication

eidScopus.description: eidScopus is the eid scopus of the publication

eissn.description: eissn is the eissn of the publication

eliAuthors.description: eliAuthors is the eli authors of the publication

eliAuthorsCount.description: eliAuthorsCount is the eli authors count of the publication

eliResearchers.description: eliResearchers are the connected researchers via HAS_RESEARCHER relationship

experimentalSystem.description: experimentalSystem is the experimental system of the publication

grant.description: grant is the grant of the publication

impactFactor.description: impactFactor is the impact factor of the publication

issn.description: issn is the issn of the publication

issue.description: issue is the issue of the publication

keywords.description: keywords is the keywords of the publication

language.description: language is the language of the publication

longJournalTitle.description: longJournalTitle is the long journal title of the publication

mediaType.description: mediaType is the media type of the publication

note.description: note is the note of the publication

oecdFord.description: oecdFord is the oecd ford of the publication

openAccessType.description: openAccessType is the open access type of the publication

pages.description: pages is the pages of the publication

pagesCount.description: pagesCount is the pages count of the publication

pdfFileName.description: pdfFileName is the name of the pdf file of the publication

pdfFileUrl.description: pdfFileUrl is the url of the pdf file of the publication

publishingCountry.description: publishingCountry is the publishing country of the publication

quartil.description: quartil is the quartil of the publication

quartilBasis.description: quartilBasis is the quartil basis of the publication

shortJournalTitle.description: shortJournalTitle is the short journal title of the publication

title.description: title is the title of the publication

uid.description: uid is the unique identifier of the publication

updatedAt.description: updatedAt is the time when the publication was last updated

userCall.description: userCall is the user call of the publication

userExperiment.description: userExperiment is the user experiment of the publication

volume.description: volume is the volume of the publication

webLink.description: webLink is the web link of the publication

wosNumber.description: wosNumber is the wos number of the publication

yearOfPublication.description: yearOfPublication is the year of publication of the publication

citizenship.description: citizenship is the country of citizenship of the researcher

firstName.description: firstName is the first name of the researcher

identificationNumber.description: identificationNumber is the identification number of the researcher

lastName.description: lastName is the last name of the researcher

orcid.description: orcid is the ORCID identifier of the researcher

researcherId.description: researcherId is the ResearcherID of the researcher

scopusId.description: scopusId is the Scopus identifier of the researcher

uid.description: uid is the unique identifier of the researcher

updatedAt.description: updatedAt is the time when the researcher was last updated

BearerAuth.description:
JWT token.
How to obtain: https://eli-eric.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CS/pages/948797504/How+to+get+PANDA+API+Token
Add word Bearer before the token here.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
